root.title: ford motor credit F TO redeem debentur
root.body: ford motor Co say ford motor credit Co april one redeem 4.0 mln dlr 8.70 pct debentur due april 1 1999 It say debentur redeem price 100 pct princip becaus april 1 1987 interest payment date debentur accru interest payabl redempt date part redempt proce debentur select redempt pro rata basi ford say
